what_it_does: Autonomous AI agent that fills out complex Nepali government forms (Company Reg, Tax, Passport) for users. Upload a photo of Citizenship/PAN, and the agent auto-fills the portal, checks for errors, and alerts you on missing docs.
where_working: USA — Harvey (Legal AI), DoNotPay. India — VakilSearch (automation features).
why_growing: Navigating Nepal's government portals (OCR, Nagarik App) is confusing. Everyone pays 'Lekhandas' (scribes) ₨500-2000 just to fill forms. An AI agent is cheaper, faster, and error-free.
nepal_adaptation: Train on specific Nepali government portal fields. Support Nepali handwriting OCR. Integrate with Nagarik App API if possible. Price: ₨100 per form fill.
monetization: Pay-per-form fill. Subscription for law firms/consultancies.
action_plan: Map fields for Company Registrar portal
Build OCR model for Nepali Citizenship card

what_it_does: Specialized ERP for Nepal's 10,000+ Gold & Silver shops. Auto-updates daily gold rates (FENEGOSIDA), calculates making charges, manages inventory by weight/purity, and generates VAT-compliant invoices.
where_working: India — Aurus, Sequretek (Jewelry ERPs). Middle East — various Gold ERPs.
why_growing: Gold shops handle millions in cash/inventory but use paper ledgers. Manual calculation errors cost huge money when gold rates change daily. Tax compliance is tightening.
nepal_adaptation: Live integration with Nepal Gold Silver Dealers Association rates. Nepali UI. Support Tola/Lal/Gram units. Safety features (customer KYC for high-value buys).
monetization: SaaS Subscription (₨2000/mo). Hardware bundle (Barcode scanner + Printer).
action_plan: Interview 5 Gold Shop owners in New Road

what_it_does: Legal document drafting agent. Describe a deal ('I am renting my house in Baneshwor to Ram for 2 years at 30k/mo'), and it drafts a legally valid agreement in Nepali/English, ready to print.
why_growing: Lawyers charge ₨5K+ for simple agreements. Most people use outdated templates that offer no protection. AI can do this instantly.
nepal_adaptation: Templates for House Rent, Land Sale, Vehicle Sale, Employee Contract. align with Muluki Dewani Samhita (Civil Code).
monetization: Per-document fee (₨200-500). Monthly for real estate agents.
action_plan: Collect 50 valid Nepali legal contract templates
Fine-tune LLM on Nepali legal terminology

what_it_does: AI dispatch agent for local delivery companies. Takes a list of 50 delivery addresses, sorts them by location (using landmarks, not just rough GPS), assigns them to riders, and pushes optimized routes to their phone.
where_working: India — Locus.sh, FarEye. Southeast Asia — NinjaVan methods.
why_growing: Kathmandu addresses are vague ('Near Pipal Bot'). Google Maps fails. Delivery efficiency acts as the margin maker for logistics.
nepal_adaptation: Build 'Landmark-based' routing engine. Interpret 'Gallis'. Integration with Pathao/Indrive API (if open) or standalone rider app.
monetization: Per-delivery optimization fee. Monthly SaaS for courier companies.
action_plan: Partner with one local courier company

what_it_does: Autonomous recruiter for Manpower agencies. Scans thousands of worker passports/bios, matches them against 'Demand Letters' from Qatar/Dubai, and auto-generates the submission file.
where_working: Global — Hired, various ATS AI tools.
why_growing: Nepal sends 2000+ workers daily. Agencies manage data manually. Speed to submit = Winning the specific demand quota.
nepal_adaptation: Parse Nepali passports and CVs. Match with Gulf job codes (Mason, Driver, Security). Auto-format for Department of Foreign Employment upload.
monetization: Subscription per agency (₨5000/mo). Success fee per placed worker.
action_plan: Get sample Demand Letter and Worker CVs
Pilot with 2 manpower agencies in Gongabu

what_it_does: Practice management software for small Poly-clinics and Dental offices. managing appointments, patient history, billing, and pharmacy inventory in one place.
why_growing: Thousands of private clinics in Nepal run on paper. Patients lose prescriptions. Inventory theft in pharmacy is common.
nepal_adaptation: Offline-first. Nepali date support. Visual teeth chart for dentists. SMS reminders for follow-ups.

what_it_does: Gym management software. Tracks member expiry, auto-blocks entry (turnstile integration), manages diet plans, and sells supplements.
why_growing: Fitness boom in Nepal. Gym owners lose 20% revenue to 'expired members' sneaking in. Manual notebook tracking is failing.
nepal_adaptation: QR code entry system. Direct eSewa link for renewals. Diet charts with Nepali foods (Dal Bhat, Chana).
action_plan: Build member database with expiry alerts

what_it_does: AI that monitors Facebook comments/DMs on a shop's page. If someone asks 'Price?' or 'Location?', it instantly DMs them the details + a 'Buy Now' link. 24/7 sales closer.
why_growing: Nepali F-commerce (Facebook Commerce) is huge. Sellers lose sales because they sleep or reply late. Instant DM increases conversion by 50%.
nepal_adaptation: Understand 'Pp', 'Price kati ho', 'Location?'. Reply in Roman Nepali/English mix. Integration with Fonepay links.
monetization: Monthly subscription (₨1000). Commission on sales tracked.
action_plan: Build Facebook Graph API comment monitor
Launch free trial for clothing stores

what_it_does: Booking and catering management for Nepal's Party Palaces. Calendar to prevent double booking, menu planner, staff roster, and cost estimator per plate.
why_growing: Wedding season is chaotic. Double bookings happen. Food waste calculation is manual. High ticket value means they can pay for software.
nepal_adaptation: Bikram Sambat Wedding Calendar integration. Menu calculator (e.g., 'Mutton Curry for 500 people = X kg meat').
action_plan: Map top 50 party palaces in Ring Road

what_it_does: Scrapes all Nepali newspaper daily tender notices (Gorkhapatra, Kantipur) and e-GP portal. Matches them to a contractor's profile and drafts the bid cover letter.
why_growing: Contractors miss tenders buried in newspapers. Manual checking is tedious. Preparation of bid documents is repetitive.
nepal_adaptation: OCR for newspaper scans (Gorkhapatra/Kantipur). Keyword matching 'Road', 'building', 'IT'. Auto-format bid bond request letter for banks.
monetization: Monthly Alert Subscription (₨2000). Bid drafting fee.
